'''Coilgrass Sigil''' is an exploration mechanic in [[Natlan]]. They can be grappled to using the [[Yumkasaurus]] and [[Scions of the Canopy]] ability to move swiftly. They must be within the player's field of vision to use, and travel cannot be canceled partway.

[[Special Coilgrass Sigil]]s additionally allow the player to create a floating platform at their current location.
